channel.title: Custom Whip 317 PI Help
channel.description:
Hey all,
So I have just added a lime whip into my 317 PI source. The models and looks are all good, but I am having some trouble with correcting the attack animations. Can anyone help me? I've gone into the combatassistant.java but can not find what to change.

item.title: Custom Whip 317 PI Help
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Go to the MeleeData.java class and attempt to do what I told you above.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Whip 317 PI Help
item.dc:creator: @zotar zotar
item.description:
@zotar wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:2, topic:544672”]Inside the CombatAssistant.java class find the getWepAnim(String weaponName) field.
There should be a switch statement to the end of that function.
The whip’s case (4151) should be in there aswell. Simply add the id of the lime whip right before or after it so that it returns the same animation ID.[/quote]

I searched for the string and this is all that was there:

}

public int getWepAnim(String weaponName) {
	return MeleeData.getWepAnim(c, weaponName);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Whip 317 PI Help
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Inside the CombatAssistant.java class find the getWepAnim(String weaponName) field.
There should be a switch statement to the end of that function.
The whip’s case (4151) should be in there aswell. Simply add the id of the lime whip right before or after it so that it returns the same animation ID.

Read full topic
